name: Slitherin'
description:
BECOME THE SNAKE(z)

Knights, Archers and Mages are here to help you fight multiple waves of the enemies. Getting hit will split your party, and cause trouble as you try to control both teams at once. Be careful with your positioning and powerup gathering and reach the final wave!

Controls
  • Use A and D or arrows left and right to steer the snake
  • Press P to Pause
Gameplay
  • Your snake can't stop moving, turn it left or right to steer
  • Eat Fruits to gain more allies
  • Your allies attack automatically when enemies are in range
Units
  • Knight - Can take two hits and swings at close enemies
  • Ranger - Has long range and can only hit single targets
  • Mage - Mid-range and has AOE. Can hit grouped up enemies from a distance.
